thread.title_full: 17 Of The Best Anniversary Quotes To Celebrate Your Love (Congrats!)

author: yourtango
title: 17 Of The Best Anniversary Quotes To Celebrate Your Love (Congrats!)
text:
“When I follow my heart, it leads me to you.” 
—Unknown 

33. 
“I love you much most beautiful darling more than anyone on the earth and I like you better than everything in the sky.” 

34. 
“I carry your heart with me (I carry it in my heart) I am never without it” 

35. 
"Words simply cannot tell how much I love you. There aren't enough words in the world to express my feelings for you, so I will just say: I love you." 
— Unknown 
Love is life’s greatest gift, which is why people have a passion for love quotes - and we’ve got you covered . When it comes to saying “I love you” , the truth about marriage , or even finding the perfect love quote for your guy , we have all the cute (or sexy !) quotes you need.
